DOC.brief_summary: An open label study to evaluate an interaction between maraviroc and raltegravir in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate An Interaction Between Maraviroc And Raltegravir In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subjects between 18 and 55 years of age. Evidence or history of clinically significant disease or clinical findings at screening
